content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL
content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. Chief Justice, I move that the Senate, sitting as 
a Court of Impeachment on the Articles against Donald John Trump 
adjourn sine die.

content.speaker: The RECORDER
content.text:
The motion was agreed to, and at 4:41 p.m., the Senate, sitting as a 
Court of Impeachment, adjourned sine die.

doc_title: ADJOURNMENT SINE DIE OF THE COURT OF IMPEACHMENT
title: ADJOURNMENT SINE DIE OF THE COURT OF IMPEACHMENT
